meanings.definition: Delicate ornamental work of fine silver, gold, or other metal wires, especially lacy jewelry.
meanings.sent1: The necklace was adorned with beautiful filagree patterns.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate filagree on the bracelet.
meanings.sent3: The filagree on the earrings sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her delicate filagree ring was a true work of art.
meanings.sent5: The filagree design on the brooch was incredibly detailed.

meanings.definition: To decorate with intricate patterns or designs.
meanings.sent1: She would filagree the edges of the mirror with silver paint.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to filagree the frame of the painting.
meanings.sent3: He filagreed the cake with intricate icing patterns.
meanings.sent4: The gardener filagreed the hedges into beautiful shapes.
meanings.sent5: The tailor filagreed the dress with delicate lace trim.
